name: Dan
description:
Dan is a simple 2D top down shooter game that I made for fun and for learning purpose :3

Please comment if you do find a bug, I will fix it asap!

Tech info:
- Engine: Custom engine that I wrote myself
- Graphics API: OpenGL

Current features:
- Multiple profiles
- Weapon upgrades

Credits:
Art by Parallel Realities, Kenney
Programming/Game design by me

FAQ
Q: Windows pops up a warning when I run the .exe file!
A: This is due to the fact that the executable is not certified. Feel free to run a virus scan if you don't trust me :)
